name: StoreMaven Ltd.
description: Provider of an A/B testing platform designed to ascertain application store conversion rates. The company's platform can find the optimal combination of icon, description and screenshots to drive install conversion in the app stores, enabling application developers to gain insights on user behavior in the stores by tracking and analyzing over 10,000,000 data points.
one_liner: Provider of an A/B testing platform designed to ascertain application store conversion rates. The company's platform can find the optimal combination of icon, description and screenshots to drive install conversion in the app stores, enabling application developers to gain insights on user behavior in the stores by tracking and analyzing over 10,000,000 data points.
